quality_assessment: Page has outdated default configuration values and missing information about workflow phases. The quick start guide is accurate but incomplete compared to the actual workflow capabilities.

issues.description: Documentation shows DOCS_DIR: 'book/src' as the example configuration but the actual workflow default is DOCS_DIR: 'docs'. The 'Option 1' section correctly shows 'docs' but is labeled as non-default when it actually IS the default.
issues.fix_suggestion: Update the example env block to show DOCS_DIR: 'docs' as the default. Swap the labeling of Option 1 and Option 2 to reflect that 'docs' is the default.

issues.description: The quick start mentions a 7-step workflow but doesn't document the actual setup phase which includes 5 distinct steps: (1) analyze features, (2) detect gaps, (3) analyze page sizes/structure, (4) split oversized pages, (5) auto-discover all pages. The real workflow has much more sophisticated pre-processing.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a section explaining the actual workflow phases in detail, particularly the setup phase. Reference the /prodigy-analyze-mkdocs-structure and /prodigy-split-oversized-mkdocs-pages commands.

issues.description: No documentation about the reduce phase which includes MkDocs build validation with --strict mode, structural validation, feature consistency checking, and Mermaid diagram validation using mermaid-sonar.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add documentation about the reduce phase capabilities including mkdocs build --strict, /prodigy-validate-mkdocs-structure, /prodigy-validate-feature-consistency, and mermaid-sonar validation.

issues.description: The map phase documentation doesn't mention the /prodigy-enhance-mkdocs-page command that adds visual features (diagrams, admonitions, annotations) to each page.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add information about page enhancement step in the map phase that adds MkDocs Material visual features.

issues.description: No mention of the error_policy configuration which uses DLQ for failed items, continues on failure, and has a max_failures setting of 2.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a section explaining error handling behavior including DLQ routing, continue_on_failure, and max_failures configuration.

positive_aspects: Clear introduction explaining what the MkDocs workflow does
Good overview of key features (gap detection, drift analysis, build validation)
Helpful configuration options section with multiple directory options
Good explanation of parallelism configuration with guidelines
Clear chapter definition examples showing JSON structure
Accurate quick start command: prodigy run workflows/mkdocs-drift.yml
improvement_suggestions: Add cross-reference to workflow-phases.md for detailed phase documentation
Include a workflow diagram showing the complete flow from setup through reduce
Add troubleshooting tips for common issues (e.g., mkdocs build failures)
Document the validate block in map phase that ensures 100% quality standards
Add section about temporary analysis files and their cleanup

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
